entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
